name: get_pricing
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sms77io.
Tool description: Send SMS & text-to-speech messages, perform phone number lookups and much more via seven.io.
API description: Retrieves pricing information for a specified country or all countries.

country.description:
An ISO Code of the country you wish to retrieve the pricing for.
*Examples*:

-  \"de\" for Germany 
- \"uk\" for Great Britain
- \"fr\" for France

If this parameter is *not* specified, the prices of *all* countries are getting returned.

format.description: Whether to return the response as *JSON* or *CSV*. The **default** is *JSON*.
